title: Gi·ªõi thi·ªáu & Thi·∫øt k·∫ø Ki·∫øn tr√∫c
content:
T·ªïng quan Workshop Ch√†o m·ª´ng b·∫°n ƒë·∫øn v·ªõi workshop to√†n di·ªán v·ªÅ x√¢y d·ª±ng Pipeline ETL x·ª≠ l√Ω d·ªØ li·ªáu E-commerce s·ª≠ d·ª•ng c√°c d·ªãch v·ª• AWS! Bu·ªïi h·ªçc th·ª±c h√†nh n√†y s·∫Ω h∆∞·ªõng d·∫´n b·∫°n t·∫°o ra m·ªôt h·ªá th·ªëng x·ª≠ l√Ω d·ªØ li·ªáu serverless hi·ªán ƒë·∫°i c√≥ th·ªÉ x·ª≠ l√Ω c√°c t√¨nh hu·ªëng th∆∞∆°ng m·∫°i ƒëi·ªán t·ª≠ th·ª±c t·∫ø.
ETL l√† g√¨? ETL vi·∫øt t·∫Øt c·ªßa Extract, Transform, Load - m·ªôt quy tr√¨nh t√≠ch h·ª£p d·ªØ li·ªáu c∆° b·∫£n:
Extract (Tr√≠ch xu·∫•t): Thu th·∫≠p d·ªØ li·ªáu t·ª´ nhi·ªÅu ngu·ªìn kh√°c nhau (website, c∆° s·ªü d·ªØ li·ªáu, API) Transform (Bi·∫øn ƒë·ªïi): L√†m s·∫°ch, x√°c th·ª±c v√† t√°i c·∫•u tr√∫c d·ªØ li·ªáu ƒë·ªÉ ph√¢n t√≠ch Load (T·∫£i): L∆∞u tr·ªØ d·ªØ li·ªáu ƒë√£ x·ª≠ l√Ω trong c√°c h·ªá th·ªëng ƒë√≠ch ƒë·ªÉ ph√¢n t√≠ch Trong th∆∞∆°ng m·∫°i ƒëi·ªán t·ª≠, pipeline ETL r·∫•t quan tr·ªçng cho:
X·ª≠ l√Ω ƒë∆°n h√†ng kh√°ch h√†ng theo th·ªùi gian th·ª±c Ph√¢n t√≠ch h√†nh vi ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng v√† t∆∞∆°ng t√°c tr√™n website Qu·∫£n l√Ω h√†ng t·ªìn kho v√† d·ªØ li·ªáu chu·ªói cung ·ª©ng T·∫°o ra c√°c b√°o c√°o business intelligence T·∫°i sao ch·ªçn AWS cho ETL? AWS cung c·∫•p c√°c d·ªãch v·ª• m·∫°nh m·∫Ω v√† hi·ªáu qu·∫£ v·ªÅ chi ph√≠ ƒë·ªÉ x√¢y d·ª±ng pipeline d·ªØ li·ªáu hi·ªán ƒë·∫°i:
Ki·∫øn tr√∫c Serverless - Kh√¥ng c·∫ßn qu·∫£n l√Ω server, t·ª± ƒë·ªông m·ªü r·ªông Tr·∫£ theo s·ª≠ d·ª•ng - Ch·ªâ tr·∫£ ti·ªÅn cho nh·ªØng g√¨ b·∫°n s·ª≠ d·ª•ng D·ªãch v·ª• ƒë∆∞·ª£c qu·∫£n l√Ω - T·∫≠p trung v√†o logic business, kh√¥ng ph·∫£i h·∫° t·∫ßng X·ª≠ l√Ω th·ªùi gian th·ª±c - X·ª≠ l√Ω streaming data hi·ªáu qu·∫£ T√≠ch h·ª£p - C√°c d·ªãch v·ª• ho·∫°t ƒë·ªông li·ªÅn m·∫°ch v·ªõi nhau
T·ªïng quan Ki·∫øn tr√∫c Pipeline ETL c·ªßa ch√∫ng ta s·∫Ω tri·ªÉn khai ki·∫øn tr√∫c d·ªØ li·ªáu hi·ªán ƒë·∫°i v·ªõi c√°c th√†nh ph·∫ßn sau:
1. Ngu·ªìn D·ªØ li·ªáu (API E-commerce Th·ª±c t·∫ø) Ch√∫ng ta s·∫Ω s·ª≠ d·ª•ng DummyJSON API ƒë·ªÉ l·∫•y d·ªØ li·ªáu e-commerce th·ª±c t·∫ø:
S·∫£n ph·∫©m: 100+ catalog s·∫£n ph·∫©m th·ª±c t·ª´ endpoint DummyJSON /products Ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng: 30 h·ªì s∆° kh√°ch h√†ng t·ª´ endpoint /users Gi·ªè h√†ng: 20 giao d·ªãch gi·ªè h√†ng t·ª´ endpoint /carts B√†i vi·∫øt & B√¨nh lu·∫≠n: N·ªôi dung do ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng t·∫°o ƒë·ªÉ m√¥ ph·ªèng ƒë√°nh gi√° X·ª≠ l√Ω Batch: Thu th·∫≠p v√† ph√¢n t√≠ch d·ªØ li·ªáu h√†ng ng√†y 2. L·ªõp Thu th·∫≠p D·ªØ li·ªáu AWS Lambda (Scheduled) s·∫Ω thu th·∫≠p d·ªØ li·ªáu t·ª´ DummyJSON:
Thu th·∫≠p d·ªØ li·ªáu serverless, hi·ªáu qu·∫£ chi ph√≠ Th·ª±c thi theo l·ªãch tr√¨nh s·ª≠ d·ª•ng CloudWatch Events Kh√¥ng c·∫ßn qu·∫£n l√Ω h·∫° t·∫ßng T√≠ch h·ª£p s·∫µn retry v√† x·ª≠ l√Ω l·ªói 3. L·ªõp X·ª≠ l√Ω D·ªØ li·ªáu AWS Lambda functions s·∫Ω bi·∫øn ƒë·ªïi v√† l∆∞u tr·ªØ d·ªØ li·ªáu:
L√†m s·∫°ch v√† chu·∫©n h√≥a d·ªØ li·ªáu DummyJSON Chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi JSON sang ƒë·ªãnh d·∫°ng Parquet Ph√¢n v√πng d·ªØ li·ªáu theo ng√†y ƒë·ªÉ truy v·∫•n hi·ªáu qu·∫£ T·∫°o datasets s·∫µn s√†ng cho ph√¢n t√≠ch 4. L·ªõp L∆∞u tr·ªØ D·ªØ li·ªáu Amazon S3 l√†m Data Lake:
L∆∞u tr·ªØ object c√≥ th·ªÉ m·ªü r·ªông, b·ªÅn v·ªØng Ph√¢n v√πng theo ng√†y ƒë·ªÉ truy v·∫•n hi·ªáu qu·∫£ Nhi·ªÅu ƒë·ªãnh d·∫°ng: JSON th√¥ v√† Parquet T·ªëi ∆∞u chi ph√≠ v·ªõi S3 Intelligent Tiering 5. L·ªõp Ph√¢n t√≠ch Amazon Athena cho truy v·∫•n SQL:
D·ªãch v·ª• truy v·∫•n serverless Truy v·∫•n d·ªØ li·ªáu tr·ª±c ti·∫øp trong S3 Giao di·ªán SQL ti√™u chu·∫©n Amazon QuickSight cho visualization:
D·ªãch v·ª• business intelligence Dashboard t∆∞∆°ng t√°c B√°o c√°o th√¢n thi·ªán v·ªõi mobile 6. Gi√°m s√°t & Qu·∫£n l√Ω Amazon CloudWatch:
Gi√°m s√°t s·ª©c kh·ªèe v√† hi·ªáu su·∫•t h·ªá th·ªëng Thi·∫øt l·∫≠p c·∫£nh b√°o v√† th√¥ng b√°o Theo d√µi chi ph√≠ v√† s·ª≠ d·ª•ng t√†i nguy√™n Ki·∫øn tr√∫c Lu·ªìng D·ªØ li·ªáu graph TDA[DummyJSON API] --> B[Lambda Collector]C[CloudWatch Events] --> BB --> D[Lambda Processor]D --> E[S3 Data Lake]E --> F[Athena]F --> G[QuickSight]H[CloudWatch Logs] --> BH --> D Lu·ªìng D·ªØ li·ªáu ETL: CloudWatch Events k√≠ch ho·∫°t Lambda theo l·ªãch tr√¨nh (h√†ng ng√†y) Lambda Collector l·∫•y d·ªØ li·ªáu t·ª´ c√°c endpoint DummyJSON API Lambda Processor bi·∫øn ƒë·ªïi v√† x√°c th·ª±c d·ªØ li·ªáu S3 Data Lake l∆∞u tr·ªØ c·∫£ d·ªØ li·ªáu th√¥ v√† ƒë√£ x·ª≠ l√Ω Athena truy v·∫•n d·ªØ li·ªáu s·ª≠ d·ª•ng SQL ti√™u chu·∫©n QuickSight t·∫°o dashboard v√† b√°o c√°o t∆∞∆°ng t√°c Schema D·ªØ li·ªáu M·∫´u Pipeline c·ªßa ch√∫ng ta s·∫Ω x·ª≠ l√Ω d·ªØ li·ªáu th·ª±c t·ª´ DummyJSON API. D∆∞·ªõi ƒë√¢y l√† c·∫•u tr√∫c d·ªØ li·ªáu th·ª±c t·∫ø:
D·ªØ li·ªáu S·∫£n ph·∫©m DummyJSON { "id": 1, "title": "iPhone 9", "description": "An apple mobile which is nothing like apple", "price": 549, "discountPercentage": 12.96, "rating": 4.69, "stock": 94, "brand": "Apple", "category": "smartphones", "thumbnail": "https://dummyjson.com/image/i/products/1/thumbnail.jpg", "images": ["https://dummyjson.com/image/i/products/1/1.jpg"] } D·ªØ li·ªáu Ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng DummyJSON { "id": 1, "firstName": "Emily", "lastName": "Johnson", "maidenName": "Smith", "age": 28, "gender": "female", "email": "emily.johnson@x.dummyjson.com", "phone": "+81 965-431-3024", "address": { "address": "626 Main Street", "city": "Phoenix", "coordinates": { "lat": 33.4484, "lng": -112.074 }, "postalCode": "85001", "state": "Arizona" } } S·ª± ki·ªán E-commerce ƒê√£ Bi·∫øn ƒë·ªïi { "event_type": "product_purchase", "timestamp": "2025-01-15T10:30:00Z", "transaction_id": "txn_123456", "user_id": 1, "product": { "id": 1, "title": "iPhone 9", "price": 549, "category": "smartphones", "brand": "Apple" }, "quantity": 1, "total_amount": 549, "user_location": { "city": "Phoenix", "state": "Arizona", "country": "USA" } } K·∫øt qu·∫£ Mong ƒë·ª£i Khi k·∫øt th√∫c workshop n√†y, b·∫°n s·∫Ω ƒë√£ x√¢y d·ª±ng ƒë∆∞·ª£c:
üéØ Pipeline ETL ho√†n ch·ªânh x·ª≠ l√Ω d·ªØ li·ªáu e-commerce th·ª±c t·∫ø t·ª´ DummyJSON üìä Dashboard t∆∞∆°ng t√°c hi·ªÉn th·ªã ph√¢n t√≠ch s·∫£n ph·∫©m, ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng v√† b√°n h√†ng üîß Ki·∫øn tr√∫c serverless v·ªõi qu·∫£n l√Ω h·∫° t·∫ßng t·ªëi thi·ªÉu üí∞ Gi·∫£i ph√°p t·ªëi ∆∞u chi ph√≠ d∆∞·ªõi $3/th√°ng s·ª≠ d·ª•ng AWS Free Tier üìà Kh·∫£ nƒÉng ph√¢n t√≠ch batch ƒë·ªÉ c√≥ insight business v√† b√°o c√°o
Ki·ªÉm tra ƒêi·ªÅu ki·ªán ti√™n quy·∫øt Tr∆∞·ªõc khi ch√∫ng ta b·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu x√¢y d·ª±ng, h√£y ƒë·∫£m b·∫£o b·∫°n c√≥:
‚úÖ T√†i kho·∫£n AWS v·ªõi quy·ªÅn qu·∫£n tr·ªã ‚úÖ AWS CLI ƒë√£ c√†i ƒë·∫∑t v√† c·∫•u h√¨nh (t√πy ch·ªçn) ‚úÖ Hi·ªÉu bi·∫øt c∆° b·∫£n v·ªÅ ƒë·ªãnh d·∫°ng d·ªØ li·ªáu JSON v√† REST APIs ‚úÖ K·∫øt n·ªëi Internet ƒë·ªÉ truy c·∫≠p DummyJSON API (https://dummyjson.com) ‚úÖ Text editor ƒë·ªÉ ch·ªânh s·ª≠a code ‚úÖ Web browser ƒë·ªÉ truy c·∫≠p AWS Console C√°c Endpoint DummyJSON API Ch√∫ng Ta S·∫Ω S·ª≠ D·ª•ng: üõçÔ∏è S·∫£n ph·∫©m: https://dummyjson.com/products (100 s·∫£n ph·∫©m th·ª±c t·∫ø) üë• Ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng: https://dummyjson.com/users (30 ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng m·∫´u) üõí Gi·ªè h√†ng: https://dummyjson.com/carts (20 gi·ªè h√†ng) üìù B√†i vi·∫øt: https://dummyjson.com/posts (150 b√†i vi·∫øt ƒë·ªÉ m√¥ ph·ªèng ƒë√°nh gi√°) üí¨ B√¨nh lu·∫≠n: https://dummyjson.com/comments (340 b√¨nh lu·∫≠n) Qu·∫£n l√Ω Chi ph√≠: M·∫∑c d√π workshop n√†y s·ª≠ d·ª•ng c√°c d·ªãch v·ª• AWS Free Tier, h√£y lu√¥n gi√°m s√°t vi·ªác s·ª≠ d·ª•ng c·ªßa b·∫°n v√† thi·∫øt l·∫≠p c·∫£nh b√°o billing ƒë·ªÉ tr√°nh c√°c kho·∫£n ph√≠ kh√¥ng mong mu·ªën.
C·∫•u tr√∫c Workshop Workshop n√†y ƒë∆∞·ª£c chia th√†nh 8 module th·ª±c h√†nh:
[Hi·ªán t·∫°i] Gi·ªõi thi·ªáu & Thi·∫øt k·∫ø Ki·∫øn tr√∫c [Ti·∫øp theo] Thu th·∫≠p D·ªØ li·ªáu v·ªõi Lambda X·ª≠ l√Ω v√† Bi·∫øn ƒë·ªïi D·ªØ li·ªáu Thi·∫øt l·∫≠p S3 Data Lake Ph√¢n t√≠ch v·ªõi Amazon Athena Visualization v·ªõi QuickSight Gi√°m s√°t v√† T·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a Cleanup v√† C√°c b∆∞·ªõc ti·∫øp theo S·∫µn s√†ng b·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu x√¢y d·ª±ng? H√£y chuy·ªÉn sang module ti·∫øp theo n∆°i ch√∫ng ta s·∫Ω t·∫°o Lambda function ƒë·ªÉ thu th·∫≠p d·ªØ li·ªáu t·ª´ DummyJSON!

title: X√¢y d·ª±ng H·ªá th·ªëng ETL Data Pipeline cho E-commerce tr√™n AWS
content:
X√¢y d·ª±ng ETL Data Pipeline cho E-commerce tr√™n AWS T·ªïng quan Workshop n√†y s·∫Ω x√¢y d·ª±ng m·ªôt h·ªá th·ªëng ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) data pipeline cho n·ªÅn t·∫£ng th∆∞∆°ng m·∫°i ƒëi·ªán t·ª≠ s·ª≠ d·ª•ng c√°c d·ªãch v·ª• AWS v√† d·ªØ li·ªáu ƒë∆∞·ª£c l·∫•y t·ª´ DummyJSON API, th·ª±c hi·ªán t·∫°o ra m·ªôt h·ªá th·ªëng x·ª≠ l√Ω d·ªØ li·ªáu ƒë∆°n gi·∫£n, hi·ªáu qu·∫£ chi ph√≠ ƒë·ªÉ thu th·∫≠p, bi·∫øn ƒë·ªïi v√† ph√¢n t√≠ch d·ªØ li·ªáu e-commerce th·ª±c t·∫ø bao g·ªìm s·∫£n ph·∫©m, ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng v√† gi·ªè h√†ng.
B√†i Workshop n√†y s·∫Ω th·ª±c hi·ªán ƒë·ªÉ x√¢y d·ª±ng data pineline c√≥ kh·∫£ nƒÉng: Thu th·∫≠p d·ªØ li·ªáu e-commerce th·ª±c t·∫ø t·ª´ DummyJSON API X·ª≠ l√Ω v√† bi·∫øn ƒë·ªïi d·ªØ li·ªáu s·ª≠ d·ª•ng AWS Lambda L∆∞u tr·ªØ d·ªØ li·ªáu c√≥ c·∫•u tr√∫c trong S3 Data Lake Ph√¢n t√≠ch d·ªØ li·ªáu s·ª≠ d·ª•ng Amazon Athena Tr·ª±c quan h√≥a th√¥ng tin kinh doanh th√¥ng qua QuickSight dashboards C√°c d·ªãch v·ª• AWS s·∫Ω d√πng ·ªü workshop n√†y Thu th·∫≠p D·ªØ li·ªáu:
AWS Lambda - Serverless compute ƒë·ªÉ thu th·∫≠p v√† x·ª≠ l√Ω d·ªØ li·ªáu CloudWatch Events - Th·ª±c thi theo l·ªãch tr√¨nh v√† t·ª± ƒë·ªông h√≥a L∆∞u tr·ªØ D·ªØ li·ªáu:

DummyJSON API - D·ªØ li·ªáu e-commerce C√°c tr∆∞·ªùng h·ª£p s·ª≠ d·ª•ng kinh doanh ETL pipeline n√†y th·ªÉ hi·ªán c√°c k·ªãch b·∫£n ph√¢n t√≠ch e-commerce th·ª±c t·∫ø:
Ph√¢n t√≠ch S·∫£n ph·∫©m - Ph√¢n t√≠ch hi·ªáu su·∫•t s·∫£n ph·∫©m v√† th√¥ng tin kho h√†ng Ph√¢n t√≠ch Kh√°ch h√†ng - Nh√¢n kh·∫©u h·ªçc v√† m√¥ h√¨nh h√†nh vi ng∆∞·ªùi d√πng Ph√¢n t√≠ch B√°n h√†ng - Ph√¢n t√≠ch gi·ªè h√†ng v√† theo d√µi chuy·ªÉn ƒë·ªïi Nghi√™n c·ª©u Th·ªã tr∆∞·ªùng - xu h∆∞·ªõng danh m·ª•c s·∫£n ph·∫©m v√† ph√¢n t√≠ch gi√° Business Intelligence - Dashboard ƒëi·ªÅu h√†nh v√† b√°o c√°o KPI C√°c th√†nh ph·∫ßn ki·∫øn tr√∫c Ngu·ªìn d·ªØ li·ªáu -
